text: Cainiao APP privacy policy
Effective date: January 25, 2018
Update date: June 17, 2022
【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, the Cainiao APP service provider (or "we") formulates this "Cainiao APP Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred toIn the process, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.
This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. How do we collect and use your personal information
3. How can we entrust the processing, sharing, transfer, or disclose your personal information publicly
4. How do we store your personal information
5. How do we protect your personal information
6. Your rights
7. How do we deal with juvenile personal information
8. How to update this policy
Nine, how to contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application
Cainiao APP (formerly "Rookie Wrap") is a software product developed by us that can provide you with services such as checking, sending, pickup, and using the rookie station and smart cabinet online.
To explain how the Cainiao App will collect, use and store your personal information and what rights you enjoy, we will explain related matters through this privacy policy.

Please pay special attention, such as the rookie APP service provider with a new form of privacy protection/privacy policy provided by the new forms provided by you with a website, client, applet, and new forms that appeared with technology development, thenThis privacy policy may also be applicable to this part of the product/service.

At the same time, this privacy policy is not applicable to the services you provided in other third directions (such as the application provided by third parties in the Cainiao APP). The service provided in the third direction is applicable to the privacy policy/guidelines that it explained to you separately.Before choosing to use this third -party service, you should fully understand its product functions, service agreements and privacy policies/guidelines, and then choose whether to open/use functions.
2. How do we collect and use your personal information
When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) In order to provide you with basic functions to provide us products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use all of our or some products and/or services;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (2) In order to provide you with additional functions to provide us products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or to achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, but it will not affect your basic functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.
The basic functions we will provide for you include:
(1) Help you register the account and account management of the Caisean APP
label: First Party Collection Information

text: In order to use the rookie APP service, you need to have a rookie account.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: You can register the Caisea account in the following ways:

text: 1. Register through your mobile phone number.

First Party Collection Information

Important

text: (4) Provide you with payment and settlement services

In order to complete the order payment, you need to provide Alipay accounts and choose the payment method. text: (5) Provide you with customer service and after-sales service

When you contact us or submit an application for handling disputes during and after sales, in order to protect your account and system security, we may require you to provide logistics order information and necessary personal information such as mobile phone number, name, etc. to verify your membership identity.

First Party Collection Information

Important
Usage

Permission Acquisition

(10) Additional functions based on cookies and similar technologies
Cookie and similar device information identification technology are commonly used in the Internet.

When you use our service, we may use related technologies to send one or more, cookie, or anonymous identifiers (hereinafter referred to as "Cookie") to collect, identify and store your access, use this product, use this productInformation about time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may use cookies or anonymous identification symbols to collect, identify and store your information when using this product.

text: We promise that cookies will not be used for any other purposes other than the purpose of this privacy policy.

We use Cookie to ensure the safety and efficient operation of products and services. It can make us confirm the security status of your account and transaction, check the relevant abnormal conditions of collapse and delay, and help you save the steps of filling in your form and entering search content.And process.
At the same time, we may use, cookie, show you the information or function you may be interested in, and optimize your choice of advertising.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may use Cookie to show you the information or functions you may be interested in and optimize your choice of advertising.

text: Most browsers provide users with the function of removing the browser cache data. You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of cookies or reject our cookies.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of Cookie or reject our cookies.

text: You may not be able to use services or corresponding functions that depend on cookies because of these modifications.
In addition to Cookie, we may also use other similar technologies such as website beacons, pixel labels, ETAG and other similar technologies on the website.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may use other similar technologies such as websites, pixel labels, ETAG and other similar technologies on the website.

text: For example, the email we send to you may contain a link to the address link to our website content. If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your product or service preferences to actively improve our customer service to improve customer serviceExperience.
label: Usage

text: Website beacon is usually a transparent image embedded in a website or email.
With the pixel labels in emails, we can know whether the email has been opened.
If you don't want your activities to be tracked in this way, you can withdraw from our signal list at any time.
ETAG (physical label) is the HTTP protocol header that is transmitted behind the Internet browser and the Internet server, which can replace Cookie.

ETAG can help us avoid unnecessary server loads, improve service efficiency, and save resources and energy. At the same time, we may record your identity through ETAG so that we can understand and improve our products or services more deeply.
Most browsers provide users with the function of removing browser cache data. You can perform the corresponding data clearance operation in the browser settings function.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can remove the operation in the browser settings function.

text: But please note that if ETAG is discontinued, you may not be able to enjoy a relatively better product or service experience.

text: (12) Algorithm usage
We may use algorithms to provide you with better services, such as predicting the rough time for the package for you.
You can click here to view our algorithm principles and information processing instructions.
3. How can we entrust the processing, sharing, transfer, or disclose your personal information publicly
(1) Entrusted processing
We may entrust a partner to handle your personal information in order to authorize partners to represent you to provide you with certain services or fulfilling functions.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We may entrust a partner to handle your personal information in order to authorize partners to represent some of our services or fulfilling functions on behalf of our services.

text: We will only entrust their information for the legal, correct, necessary, specific, and clear goals of this policy statement. We can authorize partners to only contact the information required by their duties, and we will ask for the agreement to request that it must not be requiredThis information is used for any other goals that exceed the scope of the commission and protect your personal information in accordance with laws and regulations and not lower than the standards required by this guideline.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We will only entrust them to process your information for the legal, correct, necessary, specific, and clear purpose of this policy. The authorized partners can only contact the necessary information, and must not exceed the purpose of the entrustment, and to your personal information for your personal informationProtect.

text: If the authorized partner will use your information for our unreasonable purpose, it will obtain your consent alone.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: If the authorized partner will use your information for our unreasonable purpose, it will obtain your consent alone.

text: At present, our authorized partners include the following types:
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: 1. Authorized partners of advertising and analysis of service.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

2. Cooperate logistics service provider.

In order to cooperate with various logistics resources, entrust our cooperative logistics service providers to provide you with logistics services such as satisfactory delivery, checking, picking, and sending parts, and we may put your logistics order -related information (such as the recipient's name name, Address, mobile phone number, parcel information, etc.) are provided to courier companies, warehousing companies, trunk transportation companies, distribution companies, express service stations, and smart express box operation companies such as operational enterprises and other cooperative logistics service providers, so that they can provide you with corresponding logisticsServe.

Important

text: If you refuse to authorize, please stop using rookie services.

In addition, if you want to query your parcels carried by these logistics service providers by subscribing to the applets of these logistics service providers in the Cainiao APP, you need to authorize the Cainiao APP to provide your mobile phone number to these logistics service providers to facilitate easynessIt query your corresponding package through your mobile phone number and display it in the package list of the Cainiao APP.

text: After you cancel, you will not be able to view the package information of the logistics service provider.
At present, the authorized logistics service providers are Yuantong, Shentong, and extremely rabbits.
3. Logistics information partner.

In order to provide you with a satisfactory check and pick -up service, we will entrust your logistics order -related information (such as the recipient's mobile phone number, package information, etc.) to Alipay and other logistics information partners in order to facilitate you through Alipay and other otherEnjoy the corresponding information display and push service.

text: 4. Support other partners of our business.

We will entrust other third -party service providers to provide technical infrastructure services, analyze the usage methods of our services, provide customer service, pay convenience, or conduct academic research and investigation.

text: 4. How do we store your personal information
(1) Storage period

We will only retain your personal information within the time required for the purpose of achieving costs, unless the law has compulsory deposit and retention requirements, such as the "E -Commerce Law of the People's Republic of China" requires that the goods and service information and transaction information deposit time are required.It is not less than 3 years from the date of completion.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Generally, your personal information is retained within the time limit required to achieve service purposes, unless the law has other requirements.

text: We judge the storage period of personal information mainly refer to the following standards and are based on the elderly:

text: 2. Ensure that we provide you with service safety and quality;

text: 3. Do you agree to a longer retention period;

text: 4. Whether there are other special agreements in the reserved period.

label: Data Retention
Important
Cessation of Operations

text: (2) Storage location

We will store personal information collected in the country in China in accordance with laws and regulations, and will not provide relevant personal information to overseas, unless we have clearly informs you the purpose of exit, receiving party, security measures, security risksWait for the situation and get your separate consent.
label: Data Retention
Important

If you refuse to provide us with relevant information and not allow cross -border to our overseas servers, you will not enjoy ourCross -border logistics services, but do not affect other functions of your Cainiao App.

text: (3) If you are not satisfied with our reply, especially if you think our personal information processing behavior has harm your legitimate rights and interests, you can also seek solutions by filed a lawsuit to a court with jurisdiction in the place of residence in the defendant.
Appendix: Related Definition

Cainiao APP service provider: Hangzhou Cainiao Logistics Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides Internet information services for Cainiao APP, Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. provides software technology services for Cainiao APP.
Hangzhou Cainiao Logistics Information Technology Co., Ltd. and Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. are collectively referred to as "us".
Related company: Refers to the related company of the rookie APP service provider disclosed by Alibaba Group Holding Limited (Alibaba Group Holding Limited).
Personal information: Refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information with other information alone or with other information.

Personal sensitive information: Refers to personal information including identity documents, personal biometric information, bank accounts, property information, whereabouts, trading information, under 14 years of age (inclusive) children's information (we will be specific in the guidance of privacy protection. Personal sensitive information is marked with a significant line with a thorough line).
Personal information deletion: Refers to removing personal information in a system involved in daily business functions, so that it keeps them from being retrieved and accessed.
Minor: Refers to a natural person under the age of 18.

Equipment information: Including device identifier (IMEI, IDFA, Android ID, Mac, OAID, IMSI, SIM serial number, device sequence number and other device -related information), application informationProcess information and other application related information during operation), equipment parameters and system information (device type, equipment model, operating system and hardware -related information), device network environment information (IP address, WIFI information, base station information and other network -related information)Essence
The actual collection of the product shall prevail.
In addition to another agreement, the definition used in this guideline has the same meaning as the definition in the Cainiao Network Service Agreement.
